endpoints.name: Branch locations
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of all Kapital Bank branch offices, including their addresses and working hours.

endpoints.name: ATM locations
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of all Kapital Bank ATMs, including their locations and availability.

endpoints.name: Cash-in machines
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of Kapital Bank cash-in terminals, where customers can deposit cash.

endpoints.name: Digital centers
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of Kapital Bank digital service centers, offering self-service banking and digital support.

endpoints.name: Payment terminals
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of Kapital Bank payment terminals for bill payments and other transactions.

endpoints.name: Central bank currency rates
endpoints.description: Provides daily exchange rates from the Central Bank of Azerbaijan in XML format.

endpoints.name: Currency info for different banks
endpoints.description: Provides currency information and exchange rates for different banks in Azerbaijan.

endpoints.name: All bank currency rates
endpoints.description: Provides exchange rates for all banks in Azerbaijan.
